ValidationRule.description: Requires case with CST to stay open at least 30 days to finish Phase 2 of Implementation
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND (CONTAINS(Subject, "Phase 2 Implementation"), Case_Age__c < 30, ISBLANK( ParentId ),
OR( ISPICKVAL(Implementation__r.Implementation_Status__c, "In Progress"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation__r.Implementation_Status__c, "In Progress - Census & Payroll"), ISPICKVAL(Implementation__r.Implementation_Status__c, "In Progress - Plan Creation")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Case must stay open at least 30 days to attempt to get client to complete Census & Payroll. If Census & Payroll are complete, update the Implementation before closing this case.
